commit.message:
decl2.c (do_static_destruction): Remove obsolete FIXME comment.

	* decl2.c (do_static_destruction): Remove obsolete FIXME comment.
	(finish_file): Indent comments properly.

From-SVN: r26703

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+	(finish_file): Indent comments properly.
